name: Escape The Solitude
description:
STORY: You're a soldier on an important mission to infiltrate the Soviet Union, suddenly your helicopter's wing catches alight and you are sent into the deep and dark woods, you are NOT alone. Find your damaged radio parts, repair it and call for help.

All information about the Wendigo and his domain currently discovered:

  • Cannot see, only hears
  • The Radio is sending out a static only it can hear, It's in an agitated state.
  • It's a windy night, the leaves make a lot of noise.
